remarks.para: May be inoperative provided associated engine fuel valve verified to be operative.

placard.para: Placard ENG VALVE Light(s) "LIGHT INOP" and enter item in Aircraft Deferred Item Log.

numlitem.para: With the affected engine running, pull the SPAR FUEL VALVE circuit breaker L(P6E1), R(P6E2).
Place FUEL CONTROL switch in the CUTOFF position.
If the engine stops running, the valve is operating properly.
Reset SPAR FUEL VALVE circuit breaker.
